div.p: I have just recently opened my own beauty salon where I work 3 days a week and then I also work 3 days a week doing admin.
As a beautician, well a beauty therapist, we obviously deal with a lot of different clients every day doing their treatments but also there’s a lot more involved
and it’s my own business so I have to do, you know, all the promotions, marketing, leaflets, appointment bookings, you know, everything that goes along
with setting up your own business and also with my admin job I deal with the petty cash and literally just supporting the social workers within their job roles
